00030 // Constants to define empy and full registers
00031 enum RegStatus {EMPTY,FULL};

00033 // The ACIA working mode can be busy waiting or interrupt mode
00034 // (there are two different interrupt levels for emission and reception)
00035 #define BUSY_WAITING  0  // Indicate that no ACIA interrupts are allowed.
00036 #define REC_INTERRUPT 1  // Indicate that reception interrupt are allowed.
00037 #define EM_INTERRUPT  2  // Indicate that emission  interrupt are allowed.
00038 
00039 // The following class defines a ACIA by including an hard 
00040 // simulated ACIA and by giving simple accesses like putting 
00041 // or getting a character from the ACIA.
00042 
00045 class ACIA{
